categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Planka was a Rebel Alliance MC40a Light Calamari Cruiser.

It placed Mine Type Bs in an attempt to capture the corvette group Dagger. However, two Missile Boats arrived and destroyed the mines, allowing a transport to dock and repair the two corvettes. It was presumed that they destroyed the Planka. The incident was recorded for future training simulation missions for pilots, namely Maarek Stele.
